Kerri Marusiak

Dog-Lover | Web Developer | Woodworker

I have recently completed an intensive four month web development programme at We Got Coders, and am excited to continue my path as a web developer. Through morning lectures, afternoon pair programming, and evening self study developed a solid understanding of Ruby and developed a strong interest in database structures and Javascript.


Having formerly trained as a cabinetmaker I worked to create precise, functional furniture and Iâ€™m excited to transfer these skills to coding. I became interested in coding as I saw the parallels between coding and cabinetmaking.


Hailing from the coastal/mountain city of Vancouver, Canada, I took the natural environment as inspiration and trained in the traditional craft of joinery.
